title: Valance, ca. 1815
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave
inscribed: Signed on a rock , "Delmes delin et sculpsit".
dimensions:
Warp: 61cm (24in.)
Width (parts of four pieces sewn together): 190cm (74 5/8in.)
description: Shaped valance lined and quilted. Four scenes, captioned in French, illustrating the story of the Prodigal Son. In brown on white.
